title: OPI DS038 DS Radiance Nail Polish, 0.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Think the Tin Man, aluminum foil and pure liquid metal with this shimmery silver nail polish. Sparkling and bright, the metallic Radiance is well-pigmented and smooth for long-lasting, sun-catching and timeless platinum nails. From the OPI Designer Series.
